events.message: The applicant submitted a loan application requesting financing to purchase a new home in the downtown area with a preferred closing date in two months.
The application has been categorized under Mortgage Loan after confirming that the loan is intended for purchasing a residential property.
Assigned Loan Officer Sarah Thompson to handle this mortgage loan application to ensure timely processing and personalized support for the customer.
Conducted an initial review of the application documents and credit history to verify eligibility for the requested mortgage loan amount.
Requested additional documentation including updated bank statements, proof of income for the last three months, and property appraisal report from the applicant.
Applicant successfully submitted all requested documents on time, including proof of income, bank statements, and the official property appraisal report.
Completed credit check revealing a good credit score and no outstanding defaults, supporting the applicant's eligibility for the mortgage loan.
Risk assessment performed indicates moderate risk with strong repayment capability, given the applicant's financial profile and property value.
Presented loan offer to the applicant detailing interest rate, repayment terms, and closing costs for the mortgage loan approval.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer and requested minor clarifications regarding payment schedule and early repayment fees.
Application escalated to senior underwriter for review due to applicant’s request for early repayment fee waiver and adjusted payment schedule.
Senior underwriter approved the loan application with revised terms accommodating the applicant’s requests for greater payment flexibility.
Funds for the approved mortgage loan have been successfully disbursed into the applicant’s designated escrow account for property purchase.
Followed up with the applicant post-funding to ensure satisfaction with loan terms and provide assistance for any further queries.
The mortgage loan application process has been formally closed after successful funding and completion of all administrative tasks.
